channel.title: msexchange on My New Hugo Site
channel.description: Recent content in msexchange on My New Hugo Site

item.title: Possible Exploitation of Exchange RCE CVE-2021-42321
item.description: Detects log entries that appear in exploitation attempts against MS Exchange RCE CVE-2021-42321

item.title: Remove Exported Mailbox from Exchange Webserver
item.description: Detects removal of an exported Exchange mailbox which could be to cover tracks from ProxyShell exploit

item.title: Certificate Request Export to Exchange Webserver
item.description: Detects a write of an Exchange CSR to an untypical directory or with aspx name suffix which can be used to place a webshell

item.title: Mailbox Export to Exchange Webserver
item.description: Detects a successful export of an Exchange mailbox to untypical directory or with aspx name suffix which can be used to place a webshell or the needed role assignment for it

item.title: ProxyLogon MSExchange OabVirtualDirectory
item.description: Detects specific patterns found after a successful ProxyLogon exploitation in relation to a Commandlet invocation of Set-OabVirtualDirectory

item.title: Exchange Set OabVirtualDirectory ExternalUrl Property
item.description: Rule to detect an adversary setting OabVirtualDirectory External URL property to a script in Exchange Management log

item.title: Failed MSExchange Transport Agent Installation
item.description: Detects a failed installation of a Exchange Transport Agent
